task.title: Create a New Stream
task.shortdesc: Create a new Stream in Livefyre to add content to an app or folder.

step.cmd: To create a new Stream, click Streams > Create Stream.
Select a Stream Destination: App or Folder to select a destination for the stream.

ul.li: Select an App to push all content included in the Stream to the selected App when you click Publish.
Select a Folder to continuously push all content included in the Stream to the selected folder.

info.note: To change the destination for an existing Stream, you must create a Clone then select a new destination.

step.cmd: Click Create Stream to create the Stream, and open the Stream Details page, from which you can add Rules for your Stream. For more on how to add Stream rules see Add Rules for your Stream.
